texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS AUTHORITY ACT, 2025
texts.text: NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS AUTHORITY ACT, 2025

texts.label: text
texts.orig: AN ACT to establish the National Communications Authority to regulate, promote, and develop a national framework for communication services; to provide for the licensing and certification of all spectrum and broadcasting activities; to enforce standards for  communication activities; and to provide for related matters.
texts.text: AN ACT to establish the National Communications Authority to regulate, promote, and develop a national framework for communication services; to provide for the licensing and certification of all spectrum and broadcasting activities; to enforce standards for  communication activities; and to provide for related matters.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 1. (1) There is established by this Act, the National Communications Authority as a body corporate.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 36.  (1)  The  rights,  assets  and  liabilities  accrued  in  respect  of  the  properties    vested  in  the Authority  established  under  the  National  Communications    Authority  Act  2008  (Act  769) immediately before the commencement of  this Act and the persons employed by the Authority shall be transferred  to the Authority established under this Act  and accordingly proceedings taken by or against the former Authority  may be continued by or against the Authority.
texts.text: 36.  (1)  The  rights,  assets  and  liabilities  accrued  in  respect  of  the  properties    vested  in  the Authority  established  under  the  National  Communications    Authority  Act  2008  (Act  769) immediately before the commencement of  this Act and the persons employed by the Authority shall be transferred  to the Authority established under this Act  and accordingly proceedings taken by or against the former Authority  may be continued by or against the Authority.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (2) A  contract  subsisting  between  the  former Authority  established    under  the  National Communications Authority, 2008 (Act 679) and  another person and in effect immediately before the commencement of  this Act shall subsist between the Authority under this Act and that other person.
texts.text: (2) A  contract  subsisting  between  the  former Authority  established    under  the  National Communications Authority, 2008 (Act 679) and  another person and in effect immediately before the commencement of  this Act shall subsist between the Authority under this Act and that other person.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 37. (1) The National Communications Authority Act, 2008 (Act 769)  is hereby repealed.
texts.text: 37. (1) The National Communications Authority Act, 2008 (Act 769)  is hereby repealed.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (2) Despite the repeal of Act 769 any licence, frequency,  authorisation, Regulation, notice, order, direction, appointment or any  other act lawfully made or done under the repealed enactment and in force  immediately before the commencement of this Act shall be considered to  have been made  or  done  under  this Act  and  shall  continue  to  have  effect    until  reviewed,  cancelled  or terminated.
texts.text: (2) Despite the repeal of Act 769 any licence, frequency,  authorisation, Regulation, notice, order, direction, appointment or any  other act lawfully made or done under the repealed enactment and in force  immediately before the commencement of this Act shall be considered to  have been made  or  done  under  this Act  and  shall  continue  to  have  effect    until  reviewed,  cancelled  or terminated.
